Posts.Content: homerunmomma wrote: I found a lump in my left breast last week.... am I crazy for waiting until after the holidays to get it checked out?  I haven't told my husband, not even my best friend, sister.... no one.  (well, now who ever reads this)  I just don't want to spend my holidays wondering and worry about getting bad news... or good news.  I feel like I'll be less distracted by waiting rather than going in for a m-gram... crazy I know.  I don't want to put a damper on the holidays for my family... I know there is a good chance this is nothing.... of course I know the opposite can also be true.... but IF this turns out to be more than just a lump... I'd like Christmas to be "normal"... sigh.  Two weeks really won't make that big of a difference, will it? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: waiting til after the holidays... am I crazy? homerunmomma BethNY
